What are the treatments for protein C deficiency ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of protein C deficiency:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Thrombophilia, hereditary, due to protein C deficiency, autosomal dominant  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Congenital Protein C or S Deficiency  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Necrosis  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Protein C  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Purpura   These resources from Medline
